mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.ziyua_name as ziyuaName ,a.ziyua_uuid_number as ziyuaUuidNumber ,a.ziyua_photo as ziyuaPhoto ,a.ziyua_types as ziyuaTypes ,a.ziyua_file as ziyuaFile ,a.ziyua_video as ziyuaVideo ,a.ziyua_content as ziyuaContent ,a.ziyua_delete as ziyuaDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number as laoshiUuidNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM ziyua a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and a.ziyua_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziyuaName},'%')
and a.ziyua_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziyuaUuidNumber},'%')
and a.ziyua_types = #{params.ziyuaTypes}
and a.ziyua_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziyuaVideo},'%')
and a.ziyua_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziyuaContent},'%')
and a.ziyua_delete >= #{params.ziyuaDeleteStart}
and a.ziyua_delete <= #{params.ziyuaDeleteEnd}
and a.ziyua_delete = #{params.ziyuaDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
